skills.label: Configure Microsoft Dynamics 365 settings
items: Configure auditing, document management, and collaboration

skills.label: Manage Microsoft Dynamics 365 security
items: Identify security roles, define permissions and privileges, configure access levels, configure security roles, assign security roles, implement multiple security roles, manage access, implement the standard security model and hierarchy security, configure business units, manage teams

skills.label: Configure email services
items: Identify integration options, configure email server profiles and default organization email settings, enable server-side email synchronization, enable folder tracking, map exchange folders, set up and configure the crm app for outlook

skills.label: Integrate Microsoft Dynamics 365 with other Office 365 offerings
items: Select the appropriate office 365 group integration, create and configure office 365 groups, integrate microsoft dynamics 365 and sharepoint, enable linking to onenote files, set up and configure onenote integration, configure onedrive integration

label: Implement Microsoft Dynamics 365 entities, entity relationships, and fields (20% - 25%)

skills.label: Manage Microsoft Dynamics 365 entities
items: Manage entity ownership, manage entity properties, configure system entities, describe activity entities, configure entity ownership and entity properties, implement managed properties, configure custom entities and security roles, delete entities

skills.label: Implement entity relationships
items: Define relationship types, create relationships, configure cascading rules, identify types of cascading behavior, work with hierarchical data, configure entity mapping, create connections and connection roles

skills.label: Define and configure Microsoft Dynamics 365 fields
items: Identify field types, define field naming requirements, configure field properties and field display formats, implement option sets and two option fields, configure lookup fields and customer fields

skills.label: Configure field customizations
items: Configure fields, configure field properties, use calculated fields, use rollup fields, configure global option sets, create alternate keys, configure field security and security roles, use status and status reasons, identify status reason transitions

label: Create and manage Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions, forms, views, and visualizations (25% - 30%)

skills.label: Create and manage Microsoft Dynamics 365 solutions
items: Recommend usage patterns for microsoft dynamics 365 solutions, identify solution components, identify solution types, create managed and unmanaged solutions, configure publishers and versions, manage multiple solutions, import and export solutions

skills.label: Customize Microsoft Dynamics 365 forms
items: Identify microsoft dynamics 365 form types, build a form, use specialized form components, implement access teams and subgrids, create editable grids, work with navigation, use multiple forms

skills.label: Implement Microsoft Dynamics 365 views and visualizations
items: Create, modify, manage, and delete views
Identify chart types that can be combined

skills.label: Configure Microsoft Dynamics 365 for mobile devices
items: Deploy the mobile client, identify available entities for the mobile client, configure mobile navigation, design mobile form layout, create custom controls, hide mobile form content, create multiple forms, create mobile views and activity lists

label: Implement business rules, workflows, and business process flows (20% - 25%)

skills.label: Implement and manage business rules
items: Determine when to use business rules
Identify actions that trigger business rules
Configure business rules, conditions, and actions

skills.label: Implement and manage workflows, dialogs, and custom actions
items: Identify when to use business process flows, workflow dialogs, and custom actions

skills.label: Implement and manage business process flows
items: Implement flows that use multiple entities
